c74object.name: fl.modulo~
c74object.digest: Calculates the left input frame values modulo the right input frame values.
c74object.description: Calculation is performed on pairs of values in turn. The output is a frame at least as long as the smaller of the two inputs. If inputs mismatch in length the result depends on the mismatch parameter. Either or both inputs may be set to trigger output.

entry.name: 1. /mismatch [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the mode used when dealing with mismatched input lengths:
wrap - the smaller input is read modulo against the larger input.
shrink - the output length is set to that of the smaller input.
pad_in - the smaller input is padded prior to calculation to match the larger input.
pad_out - the output is padded to match the length of the larger input.
[0] - wrap [1] - shrink [2] - pad_in [3] - pad_out

entry.name: 2. /trigger_ins [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets which inputs trigger output.
[0] - both [1] - left [2] - right

entry.name: 3. /pad [instantiation double]
entry.description: Sets the value used for padding (for either pad_in or pad_out modes).
